sqlMap.select: SELECT e.* FROM mng_sysint e where e.sysint_sstate ='0' order by e.sysint_sno

SELECT e.* FROM mng_emp e where e.emp_sisdel ='0' and e.emp_sisvalid='0'
(e.ud_sno = #ud_sno# or e.comp_stemp = #ud_sno# )
(e.ud_sno1 = #ud_sno1# or e.dep_stemp = #ud_sno1#)
(e.ud_sno2 = #ud_sno2# or e.job_stemp = #ud_sno2#)
(e.ud_sno3 = #ud_sno3# or e.class_stemp = #ud_sno3#)
(e.sh_sno = #sh_sno# or e.team_stemp = #sh_sno#)
(e.emp_sno = #emp_sno# or e.team_stemp = #emp_sno#)
(e.job_sno = #job_sno# or e.team_stemp = #job_sno#)
(e.post_sno = #post_sno# or e.team_stemp = #post_sno#)
order by e.emp_sno

select count(1) from mng_emp e
where e.emp_sisdel ='0' and e.emp_sisvalid='0'
(e.ud_sname like '%$searchA$%' )
(e.ud_sname1 like '%$searchB$%' )
(e.ud_sname2 like '%$searchC$%')
(e.ud_sname3 like '%$searchD$%' )
(e.sh_sno = #searchE# )
(e.ud_sno like '%$ud_sno$%' )
(e.ud_sno1 like '%$ud_sno1$%' )
(e.ud_sno2 like '%$ud_sno2$%')
(e.ud_sno3 like '%$ud_sno3$%' )
(e.sh_sno like '%$sh_sno$%' )
e.ud_sno = #searchG# or e.ud_sno1 = #searchG# or e.ud_sno2 = #searchG# or e.ud_sno3 = #searchG#
e.emp_sno = #emp_sno#
e.emp_sno != #searchF#
order by e.emp_sno

$pageSQLA$ select e.*,d1.ditem_sname as ditem_sname1,d2.ditem_sname as ditem_sname2,cl1.post_sname,s.sh_sname,j.job_sname from mng_emp e left join mng_school s on s.sh_sno=e.sh_sno and s.sh_sisdel='0' and s.sh_sisvalid='0' left join mng_job j on j.job_sno=e.job_sno left join mng_post cl1 on cl1.post_sno = e.post_sno and cl1.post_sisdel='0' and cl1.post_sisvalid='0' left join mng_dict di on di.dict_sname ='emp_nlevel' and di.dict_sisdel='0' and di.dict_sisvalid='0' left join mng_dictitem d1 on d1.ditem_svalue = to_char(e.emp_nlevel) and di.dict_sno=d1.dict_sno left join mng_dict di1 on di1.dict_sname ='emp_sstype' and di1.dict_sisdel='0' and di1.dict_sisvalid='0' left join mng_dictitem d2 on d2.ditem_svalue = e.emp_sstype and di1.dict_sno=d2.dict_sno where e.emp_sisdel ='0' and e.emp_sisvalid='0'
(e.ud_sname like '%$searchA$%' )
(e.ud_sname1 like '%$searchB$%' )
(e.ud_sname2 like '%$searchC$%')
(e.ud_sname3 like '%$searchD$%' )
(e.sh_sno = #searchE# )
(e.ud_sno like '%$ud_sno$%' )
(e.ud_sno1 like '%$ud_sno1$%' )
(e.ud_sno2 like '%$ud_sno2$%')
(e.ud_sno3 like '%$ud_sno3$%' )
(e.sh_sno like '%$sh_sno$%' )
e.ud_sno = #searchG# or e.ud_sno1 = #searchG# or e.ud_sno2 = #searchG# or e.ud_sno3 = #searchG#
e.emp_sno = #emp_sno#
e.emp_sno != #searchF#
order by e.emp_sno $pageSQLB$

SELECT c.* FROM mng_emp c where c.comp_sisdel ='0' and c.comp_sisvalid='1'
CONNECT BY PRIOR c.comp_sno = c.comp_sSuper START WITH c.comp_sno=#comp_ssuper#
order by c.comp_sno

SELECT d.* FROM base_Department d left join mng_dict di on di.dict_sname ='ud_smunidep' and di.dict_sisdel='0' and di.dict_sisvalid='0' left join mng_dictitem d1 on di.dict_sno=d1.dict_sno and d1.ditem_svalue = u.ud_smunidep left join mng_dict di1 on di1.dict_sname ='ud_nnumber' and di1.dict_sisdel='0' and di1.dict_sisvalid='0' left join mng_dictitem d2 on di1.dict_sno=d2.dict_sno and d2.ditem_svalue = to_char(u.ud_nnumber) where d.dep_sisdel ='0' and d.dep_sisvalid='1'
d.comp_sno = #comp_sno#
order by d.dep_sno

$pageSQLA$ select distinct s.* from mng_school s
left join Mng_SchoolDepart sd on sd.sh_sno=s.sh_sno left join mng_unitdepart u on u.ud_sno=sd.ud_sno and u.ud_sisdel='0' left join lab_org o on o.ud_sno=u.ud_sno and o.lo_sisdel='0' where o.lo_sno = #lo_sno# and s.sh_sisdel='0'
where s.sh_sisdel='0'
s.sh_sno=#searchA#
order by s.sh_sno $pageSQLB$

select count(1) from mng_school s
left join Mng_SchoolDepart sd on sd.sh_sno=s.sh_sno left join mng_unitdepart u on u.ud_sno=sd.ud_sno and u.ud_sisdel='0' left join lab_org o on o.ud_sno=u.ud_sno and o.lo_sisdel='0' where o.lo_sno = #lo_sno# and s.sh_sisdel='0'
where s.sh_sisdel='0'
s.sh_sno=#searchA#
order by s.sh_sno
select max(ud_nnumber) from mng_unitdepart
select u.* from mng_unitdepart u CONNECT BY PRIOR u.ud_sno = u.ud_stopno START WITH u.ud_sno=#ud_sno#

$pageSQLA$ select u.*,u1.ud_sno as ud_sno1 ,u1.ud_sname as ud_sname1, u2.ud_sno as ud_sno2,u2.ud_sname as ud_sname2, u3.ud_sno as ud_sno3,u3.ud_sname as ud_sname3, u4.ud_sno as ud_sno4,u4.ud_sname as ud_sname4, u5.ud_sno as ud_sno5,u5.ud_sname as ud_sname5, u6.ud_sno as ud_sno6,u6.ud_sname as ud_sname6, d1.ditem_sname as ditem_sname1,d2.ditem_sname as ditem_sname2 from mng_unitdepart u left join mng_unitdepart u1 on u.ud_stopno=u1.ud_sno left join mng_unitdepart u2 on u1.ud_stopno=u2.ud_sno left join mng_unitdepart u3 on u2.ud_stopno=u3.ud_sno left join mng_unitdepart u4 on u3.ud_stopno=u4.ud_sno left join mng_unitdepart u5 on u4.ud_stopno=u5.ud_sno left join mng_unitdepart u6 on u5.ud_stopno=u6.ud_sno
left join mng_dict di on di.dict_sname ='ud_smunidep' and di.dict_sisdel='0' and di.dict_sisvalid='0' left join mng_dictitem d1 on di.dict_sno=d1.dict_sno and d1.ditem_svalue = u.ud_smunidep left join mng_dict di1 on di1.dict_sname ='ud_nnumber' and di1.dict_sisdel='0' and di1.dict_sisvalid='0' left join mng_dictitem d2 on di1.dict_sno=d2.dict_sno and d2.ditem_svalue = to_char(u.ud_nnumber)
where u.ud_sisdel='0' and u.ud_sisvalid='0'
u.ud_sno=#searchA#
u.ud_sname like '%$searchB$%'
u.ud_sno=#ud_sno#
u.ud_stopno=#ud_stopno#
u.ud_nnumber=#ud_nnumber#
u.ud_nnumber!=#searchC#
u.ud_stype=#ud_stype#
u.ud_sno= (select e.ud_sno from mng_emp e where e.emp_sno=#searchG# ) or u.ud_sno= (select e.ud_sno1 from mng_emp e where e.emp_sno=#searchG# )or u.ud_sno= (select e.ud_sno2 from mng_emp e where e.emp_sno=#searchG# )or u.ud_sno= (select e.ud_sno3 from mng_emp e where e.emp_sno=#searchG# )
u.ud_stop=#ud_stop#
(u.ud_nnumber='2' or u.ud_nnumber='3')
order by u.ud_sno $pageSQLB$

select count(1) from mng_unitdepart u where u.ud_sisdel='0' and u.ud_sisvalid='0'
u.ud_sno=#searchA#
u.ud_sname like '%$searchB$%'
u.ud_sno=#ud_sno#
u.ud_stopno=#ud_stopno#
u.ud_nnumber=#ud_nnumber#
u.ud_nnumber!=#searchC#
u.ud_stype=#ud_stype#
u.ud_sno= (select e.ud_sno from mng_emp e where e.emp_sno=#searchG# ) or u.ud_sno= (select e.ud_sno1 from mng_emp e where e.emp_sno=#searchG# )or u.ud_sno= (select e.ud_sno2 from mng_emp e where e.emp_sno=#searchG# )or u.ud_sno= (select e.ud_sno3 from mng_emp e where e.emp_sno=#searchG# )
u.ud_stop=#ud_stop#
(u.ud_nnumber='2' or u.ud_nnumber='3')
order by u.ud_sno

SELECT e.* FROM mng_job e where e.job_sisdel ='0' and e.job_sisvalid='0'
e.ud_sno = #ud_sno#
order by e.job_sno

select * from mng_dictitem t left join mng_dict d on d.dict_sno=t.dict_sno where d.dict_sisdel='0' and d.dict_sisvalid='0' and d.dict_sname=#dict_sname#
d.sysint_sno=#sysint_sno#
d.dict_stype='0'
d.dict_ntype=#dict_ntype#
order by t.ditem_nid

select count(1) from base_department d left join base_department d1 on d1.dep_sno=d.dep_ssuper left join mng_emp c on c.comp_sno=d.comp_sno where d.dep_sisdel ='0' and d.dep_sisvalid='0'
d.comp_sno = #comp_sno#
d.dep_sno like '%'||#searchA#||'%'
d.dep_sname like '%'||#searchB#||'%'
c.comp_sname like '%'||#searchC#||'%'
CONNECT BY PRIOR c.comp_sno = c.comp_sSuper START WITH c.comp_sno=#comp_ssuper#
order by d.dep_sno

$pageSQLA$ select d.*, d1.dep_sname as dep_ssupername, c.comp_sname from base_department d left join base_department d1 on d1.dep_sno=d.dep_ssuper left join mng_emp c on c.comp_sno=d.comp_sno where d.dep_sisdel ='0' and d.dep_sisvalid='0'
d.comp_sno = #comp_sno#
d.dep_sno like '%'||#searchA#||'%'
d.dep_sname like '%'||#searchB#||'%'
c.comp_sname like '%'||#searchC#||'%'
CONNECT BY PRIOR c.comp_sno = c.comp_sSuper START WITH c.comp_sno=#comp_ssuper#
order by d.dep_sno
$pageSQLB$

select count(1) from mng_job j left join mng_unitdepart d on d.ud_sno=j.ud_sno
where j.job_sisdel ='0' and j.job_sisvalid='0'
j.ud_sno = #ud_sno#
j.job_sno like '%'||#searchA#||'%'
j.job_sname like '%'||#searchB#||'%'
d.ud_sname like '%'||#searchE#||'%'
CONNECT BY PRIOR d.ud_sno = d.ud_stopno START WITH d.ud_sno=#ud_stopno#
order by j.job_sno

$pageSQLA$ select j.*,d1.ditem_sname as ditem_sname1,d2.ditem_sname as ditem_sname2, d.ud_sname from mng_job j left join mng_unitdepart d on d.ud_sno=j.ud_sno left join mng_dict di on di.dict_sisdel='0' and di.dict_sisvalid='0' and di.dict_sname ='job_stype' left join mng_dictitem d1 on di.dict_sno=d1.dict_sno and d1.ditem_svalue = j.job_stype left join mng_dict di1 on di1.dict_sname ='job_nlevel' and di1.dict_sisdel='0' and di1.dict_sisvalid='0' left join mng_dictitem d2 on di1.dict_sno=d2.dict_sno and d2.ditem_svalue = to_char(j.job_nlevel) where j.job_sisdel ='0' and j.job_sisvalid='0'
j.ud_sno = #ud_sno#
j.job_sno like '%'||#searchA#||'%'
j.job_sname like '%'||#searchB#||'%'
d.ud_sname like '%'||#searchE#||'%'
CONNECT BY PRIOR d.ud_sno = d.ud_stopno START WITH d.ud_sno=#ud_stopno#
order by j.job_sno
$pageSQLB$

$pageSQLA$ select s.* from mng_sysint s where s.sysint_sstate='0'
s.sysint_sname like '%$searchA$%'
s.sysint_ssname like '%$searchB$%'
s.sysint_susrtype = #searchC#
s.sysint_sno = #sysint_sno#
order by s.sysint_sno $pageSQLB$

select count(1) from mng_sysint s where s.sysint_sstate='0'
s.sysint_sname like '%$searchA$%'
s.sysint_ssname like '%$searchB$%'
s.sysint_susrtype = #searchC#
s.sysint_sno = #sysint_sno#
order by s.sysint_sno

$pageSQLA$
select s.SYSINT_SNAME sysint_sname, r1.RIGHT_SNAME right_sparentname, r.* from MNG_RIGHT r left join MNG_SYSINT s on r.SYSINT_SNO = s.SYSINT_SNO left join MNG_RIGHT r1 on r.RIGHT_SPARENTNO=r1.RIGHT_SNO and r1.sysint_sno=r.sysint_sno where r.RIGHT_SISDEL='0' and s.SYSINT_SSTATE='0' and r.right_sisvalid='0' and r.right_nmorb='1'
s.sysint_sname like '%$searchA$%'
r.right_sname like '%$searchB$%'
r1.right_sname like '%$searchC$%'
r.right_sno = #right_sno#
r.sysint_sno = #sysint_sno#
order by r.right_sno $pageSQLB$

select count(1) from MNG_RIGHT r left join MNG_SYSINT s on r.SYSINT_SNO = s.SYSINT_SNO left join MNG_RIGHT r1 on r.RIGHT_SPARENTNO=r1.RIGHT_SNO and r1.sysint_sno=r.sysint_sno where r.RIGHT_SISDEL='0' and s.SYSINT_SSTATE='0' and r.right_sisvalid='0' and r.right_nmorb='1'
s.sysint_sname like '%$searchA$%'
r.right_sname like '%$searchB$%'
r1.right_sname like '%$searchC$%'
r.right_sno = #right_sno#
r.sysint_sno = #sysint_sno#
order by r.right_sno

$pageSQLA$ select s.*,d1.ditem_sname as ditem_sname1 from mng_post s left join mng_dict di on di.dict_sisdel='0' and di.dict_sisvalid='0' and di.dict_sname ='post_nlevel' left join mng_dictitem d1 on di.dict_sno=d1.dict_sno and d1.ditem_svalue = to_char(s.post_nlevel)
where s.post_sisdel='0' and s.post_sisvalid='0'
s.post_sno like '%$searchA$%'
s.post_sname like '%$searchB$%'
s.post_sno =#post_sno#
order by s.post_sno $pageSQLB$

select count(1) from mng_post s
where s.post_sisdel='0' and s.post_sisvalid='0'
s.post_sno like '%$searchA$%'
s.post_sname like '%$searchB$%'
s.post_sno =#post_sno#
order by s.post_sno

select count(1) from mng_user u
u.status='0'
u.screenname like '%'||#searchA#||'%'
u.firstname||u.lastname like '%'||#searchB#||'%'

$pageSQLA$ select u.* from mng_user u
u.status='0'
u.screenname like '%'||#searchA#||'%'
u.firstname||u.lastname like '%'||#searchB#||'%'
$pageSQLB$
